mapper.select: SELECT OD.ORDER_ID, OD.SALES_POST_ID, OD.UNIT_PRICE, OD.DISCOUNT_PRICE, OD.QUANTITY AS ORDER_QUANTITY, SP.TITLE AS SALES_POST_TITLE, SP.DESCRIPTION AS SALES_POST_DESCRIPTION, SP.PRICE AS SALES_POST_PRICE, SP.QUANTITY AS SALES_POST_QUANTITY, P.PRODUCT_NUMBER, P.NAME AS PRODUCT_NAME, P.DESCRIPTION AS PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION, P.PRICE AS PRODUCT_PRICE, P.QUANTITY AS PRODUCT_QUANTITY, PF.FILE_PATH, PF.FILE_TYPE FROM ORDER_DETAIL_TB OD JOIN SALES_POST_TB SP ON OD.SALES_POST_ID = SP.ID JOIN PRODUCT_TB P ON SP.PRODUCT_NUMBER = P.PRODUCT_NUMBER JOIN PRODUCT_FILE_TB PF ON P.PRODUCT_NUMBER = PF.PRODUCT_NUMBER ORDER BY OD.QUANTITY DESC
